name: Establish Secret Base
Lore: 'The Empire''s remote bases develop new technology and hide sensitive projects from potential Rebel saboteurs.',
Text: 'Deploy on Endor system if your biker scouts and/or AT-STs control three Endor sites. Your Force drain here is +1 for each Endor site your biker scout or AT-ST controls (limit +3). Place Effect in Used Pile if opponent controls this system. (Immune to Alter.)',
